communications.communication:
Dear FBI:

This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act. Please produce all records related to Tom Chris Korologos. Mr. Korologos was born in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA on April 6, 1933 and died on July 26, 2024 in Washington, D.C.

PROOF OF DEATH:

Mr. Korologos's news obituary from the Washington Post is attached.

SCOPE OF SEARCH:

In addition to standard practices, please search the Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) Indices, the Microphone Surveillance (MISUR) Indices, the Physical Surveillance (FISUR) Indices, and the Technical Surveillance (TESUR) Indices.

FORM OF PRODUCTION

I would prefer that you produce responsive records electronically, by email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

Thank you very much.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Marritz
